author: Jason Holt
description: This is a very cheap way to potentially reduce the very long time in which surviving patients can infect others through intercourse.
summary: Suggested by a nurse friend: immersion of the testicles in hot water reduces sperm count.  Give surviving male patients a very hot bath before discharging them, to kill off some or all of the surviving infected sperm.
title: Reduce virus transmission by semen with a hot bath
